promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple clam water-type pokemon with a white and black shell. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or clam. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pearlobyss, a a massive simple clam water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Cleanse Away. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "clam", "water" or "Pearlobyss". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, clam-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, gleaming bubble background
generatedDescription: This monolithic bivalve creature, Pearlobyss, resides in fresh current habitats. Its Cleanse Away ability purifies its surroundings daily.
